name: Block Parkour (GooseOnoob)
description:
You are a block and you parkour. Collect all the coins in a level to open the level portal. Once opened, go through it to get to the next level.

If you have any suggestions feel free to leave a comment.

Controls:

  • WASD Or Arrow Keys To Move And Jump
  • <> To Switch Characters

- DevLog Update Alpha 0.0.2

Added:

Options Menu (Not Yet Working, Refresh If You Pressed)

B- Coins, Coins That Allow You To Set Respawns And That Are "*bLuE*"

Nerfed Level 10

Map Editor For Game Devs So We Can Make More Good Maps :D
